definition: being or characteristic of a single thing or person, a human being
details:
adjective
- being or characteristic of a single thing or person
= example: being or characteristic of a single thing or person
= synonyms: single
- separate and distinct from others of the same kind
= example: separate and distinct from others of the same kind
= synonyms: case-by-case
- characteristic of or meant for a single person or thing
= example: characteristic of or meant for a single person or thing
= synonyms: single
- concerning one person exclusively
= synonyms: private
noun
- a human being
= synonyms: person
- a single organism
